languages.text: "Воистину. Вероятно, они начали вербовку среди рабочих — в их массах просто скрыться. Под видом союза техноматов они получили ширму для тайных операций и проникновения в эшелоны власти. Каждый кризис позволял им завоевать наше доверие и получить ресурсы".

"Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."
languages.original_text: "Воистину. Вероятно, они начали вербовку среди рабочих — в их массах просто скрыться. Под видом союза техноматов они получили ширму для тайных операций и проникновения в эшелоны власти. Каждый кризис позволял им завоевать наше доверие и получить ресурсы".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. They probably have started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising as the Technomat union, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration of the echelons of authority. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive resources."

"Indeed. They probably have started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising as the Technomat union, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration of the echelons of authority. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive resources."

"Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

"Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

"Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

languages.text: “确实如此。他们可能已经开始招聘工人了，因为工人很容易被他们蒙骗。他们伪装成技工，为他们的秘密行动与权力渗透提供掩护。每当达戈努斯发生危机时，他们都会协助我们，以此逐步取得我们的信任，获得更多资源。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。他们可能已经开始招聘工人了，因为工人很容易被他们蒙骗。他们伪装成技工，为他们的秘密行动与权力渗透提供掩护。每当达戈努斯发生危机时，他们都会协助我们，以此逐步取得我们的信任，获得更多资源。”

languages.text: «Efectivamente. Probablemente han empezado a reclutar a los trabajadores, es fácil desaparecer entre ellos. Disfrazándose de tecnómatas, consiguieron una tapadera para sus operaciones secretas y su infiltración en las altas esferas del poder. Cada crisis les permitió ganarse nuestra confianza y recibir nuestros recursos».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente. Probablemente han empezado a reclutar a los trabajadores, es fácil desaparecer entre ellos. Disfrazándose de tecnómatas, consiguieron una tapadera para sus operaciones secretas y su infiltración en las altas esferas del poder. Cada crisis les permitió ganarse nuestra confianza y recibir nuestros recursos».

languages.text: 「確かに。奴らはおそらく労働者を勧誘し始めたのだろう...労働者の中に紛れ込むのは簡単だからな。テクノマットを装うことで、奴らは秘密工作の隠れ蓑を手に入れ、権力の上層部に潜入した。危機のたびに、奴らが私たちの信頼を獲得し、資源を受け取っていったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに。奴らはおそらく労働者を勧誘し始めたのだろう...労働者の中に紛れ込むのは簡単だからな。テクノマットを装うことで、奴らは秘密工作の隠れ蓑を手に入れ、権力の上層部に潜入した。危機のたびに、奴らが私たちの信頼を獲得し、資源を受け取っていったんだ」

languages.text: « En effet. Ils ont sans doute commencé par recruter les ouvriers... Il est en effet plus facile de se fondre dans la foule. En se faisant passer pour des technomates, ils ont créé une couverture pour leurs opérations secrètes d'infiltration au sein des échelons supérieurs de la hiérarchie. Chaque crise leur a permis de gagner un peu plus notre confiance et de mettre la main sur nos ressources. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Ils ont sans doute commencé par recruter les ouvriers... Il est en effet plus facile de se fondre dans la foule. En se faisant passer pour des technomates, ils ont créé une couverture pour leurs opérations secrètes d'infiltration au sein des échelons supérieurs de la hiérarchie. Chaque crise leur a permis de gagner un peu plus notre confiance et de mettre la main sur nos ressources. »

languages.text: "In der Tat. Sie haben vermutlich begonnen, die Arbeiter zu rekrutieren. In der Masse kann man leicht untertauchen. Als Technomaten verkleidet hatten sie eine Tarnung für ihre geheimen Operationen und ihre Infiltration der obersten Ebenen der Macht. Jede Krise gestattete ihnen, unser Vertrauen zu gewinnen und unsere Ressourcen zu empfangen."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They have probably started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Sie haben vermutlich begonnen, die Arbeiter zu rekrutieren. In der Masse kann man leicht untertauchen. Als Technomaten verkleidet hatten sie eine Tarnung für ihre geheimen Operationen und ihre Infiltration der obersten Ebenen der Macht. Jede Krise gestattete ihnen, unser Vertrauen zu gewinnen und unsere Ressourcen zu empfangen."
